posts.post_title: T206 Sale ++ Cobb ++ Red + Bat Off ++ Reduced
posts.post_content:

Cobb, red, PB – 1 – 1350

Thanks, Scott

Bump for price reduction, and possible Hindu Trades.

Thanks, Scott
